author: Jordan White
text:
The LV bag I bought my wife was marked as “excellent condition” with no visible signs of wear. However there was a very obvious white mark on the EPI leather that would not come off on the side of the bag. I had to touch it up with sharpie which will no doubt wear off in time.

Happy with the site navigation and ease of use, but in this case the description/condition was extremely misleading. Had the flaw been highlighted, I likely would have passed on the specific bag in favor of a more mint condition one.

Ordered a wallet which will show up tomorrow. We’ll see how it goes for round 2
title: Misleading Condition for LV Bag

author: Barb
text: I think there is a severe lack of photos, and the descriptions are way too broad. I tried contacting customer service for additional info/photos and was told she could get it for me and that she could hold the bag while we awaited the info, only for her to say she misspoke and wouldn’t hold the bag. Never got more info. Purchased the bag basically blind, there was no mention of the smell, or the stains on the interior in the description. The bag arrived in a box with no padding, this is a $2,090 bag that I’m paying $800 for banging around loosely in a cardboard box. On top of it all it’s non refundable… I think if you are not going to offer refunds you need to severally step up the items listed above or just offer refunds this is 2022.

author: customer
text: No where did my product say what gender it was for. I filtered the shoes i was looking for by my size and i assumed since i told the app i’m female it would give me female sizes. It never said what it was and when they came they were huge and mens. Maybe i mis read but maybe they should clarify that. Other things about the product seemed off and they should’ve disclosed that. I know they were used shoes and i expected normal signs of usage but they had missing studs that would’ve been nice to know about before purchase.
title: Product details are misleading

author: customer
text: I ordered a small bracelet that weighed a couple of ounces, at most. There is a flat delivery fee of 12.95. Seemed excessive, but I understand it’s a flat rate. After one week, it has not shipped, and I contacted customer service, who said it would ship within 48 hrs. It shipped 4 days later. And it was sent the slowest rate possible, arriving a week after shipment. The order took almost 3 weeks to arrive. Not the service I expected.
title: Slow, overpriced shipping.

author: ANIH
text: I ordered a dress from the real real.  Upon arrival and opening the box, I noticed the dress was filthy.  There were mold spores on the dress itself and visible dirt stains on the hem of the dress.  I reached out to customer service and they just gave me instructions on how to start a return, no apology, no credit or discount for future orders.  This really left a bad taste in my mouth and I will not be ordering from them again.
title: Worst Service of All time

author: Leslie Bannon
text:
I gave 2 stars due to the length of time in getting my items listed and the accuracy of important details about the item. For instance, listing my size 6 shoes for size 9. It took over 3 months to get most of items active, and way too many phones and very long hold times to get clear answers. It was a much different experience from what I was told by the processor who picked up my jewelry, clothing and shoes. 
Most of all my items have sold, and I may send them more items, but now I know what to expect. 

Leslie
title: Horrible Customer Service
